entry.title: Twirlies: ‘Think That I'm In Love’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Twirlies: ‘Think That I'm In Love’

 Best New Music

Taking their cues from ‘90s shamble-pop greats like Yo La Tengo and The Pastels, the Norwegian trio Twirlies makes a swoon-worthy debut with “Think That I’m In Love.”

Jul. 4

entry.title: The Favors: ‘The Little Mess You Made’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
The Favors: ‘The Little Mess You Made’

 Best New Music

Longtime friends FINNEAS and Ashe have a habit of casual collabs that create hits. Think: “ Moral of the Story ” (2019) and “ Till Forever Falls Apart ” (2021).

Jul. 3

entry.title: Raine: ‘To You’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Raine: ‘To You’

 Best New Music

KCRW Young Creator’s Project alum Raine is back with Backseat, a new EP due in Sept of this year.

Jul. 2

entry.title: Mac DeMarco: ‘Home’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Mac DeMarco: ‘Home’

 Best New Music

Hooray, Mac DeMarco has a new album on the horizon! Guitar is set to drop on Aug 22 via his own record label, Mock Media. Get a taste of what lies ahead by tuning into “Home.”

Jul. 1

entry.title: Drugdealer: ‘Real Thing’ (feat. Weyes Blood) (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Drugdealer: ‘Real Thing’ (feat. Weyes Blood)

 Best New Music

Michael Collins (aka Drugdealer ) has once again teamed up with his longtime pal Natalie Laura Mering (aka Weyes Blood ).

Jun. 30

entry.title: Renée Elise Goldsberry: ‘Staring’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Renée Elise Goldsberry: ‘Staring’

 Best New Music

You may recognize Tony and Grammy winner Renée Elise Goldsberry from her role as Angelica Schuyler in the filmed version of Hamilton.

Jun. 27

entry.title: S.G. Goodman: ‘Snapping Turtle’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
S.G. Goodman: ‘Snapping Turtle’

 Best New Music

Born and bred in Western Kentucky, S.G. Goodman is an old soul of a storyteller whose work points to ancient traditions and lost ways of life.

Jun. 26

entry.title: Night Tapes: ‘Pacifico’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Night Tapes: ‘Pacifico’

 Best New Music

London’s Night Tapes are set to release their hotly-anticipated debut album, portals//polarities, on September 26.

Jun. 25
